mapper.select:
select
from ai_config
where display_name like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') or model_id like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') or model_name like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%')

select
from ai_config where is_enabled = 0 and model_type = 0 or model_type = 2
mapper.insert:
insert into ai_config
id, display_name, api_domain, model_name, model_type, model_id, api_key, max_context_msgs, similarity_top_p, temperature, similarity_top_k, is_default, case_tags, case_brief, case_remark, is_enabled, create_time, update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apiDomain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{modelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apiKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxContextMsgs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{similarityTopP,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{temperature,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{similarityTopK,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{caseTags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseBrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEnabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update ai_config
display_name = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
api_domain = #{apiDomain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model_name = #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model_type = #{modelType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
api_key = #{apiKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
max_context_msgs = #{maxContextMsgs,jdbcType=INTEGER},
similarity_top_p = #{similarityTopP,jdbcType=FLOAT},
temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=FLOAT},
similarity_top_k = #{similarityTopK,jdbcType=FLOAT},
is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT},
case_tags = #{caseTags,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_brief = #{caseBrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_remark = #{caseRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_enabled = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ai_config set display_name = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, api_domain = #{apiDomain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_name = #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_type = #{modelType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, api_key = #{apiKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, max_context_msgs = #{maxContextMsgs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, similarity_top_p = #{similarityTopP,jdbcType=FLOAT}, temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=FLOAT}, similarity_top_k = #{similarityTopK,jdbcType=FLOAT}, is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT}, case_tags = #{caseTags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_brief = #{caseBrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_remark = #{caseRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_enabled = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update ai_config set is_default = 0 where id != #{id}
